channel.title: Zahada
channel.description:
Stumbled upon this link when I was browsing some old blog post of mine. It's a series of challenging questions/riddles.
http://www.mcgov.co.uk/zahada.html
Level 1: The answer is obvious. Level 2: Say out your alphabets and figure out the answer! Level 3: Don't just look at the page. Level 4: A four-letter word that rhymes with 'duck'. Level 5: Read out the lines aloud. Level 6: Read out the word and highlight the whole page. Level 7: Zooooom. Level 8: A motherfuckin' sharp stationery. Level 9: View the page source. Level 10: View the page source to get values of other letters. Level 11: View the page source and do binary addition. Level 12: View the page source. Level 13: Google the title. Level 14: Solve the anagram (highlight the page). Level 15: Google (the letter 'o's in the word 'too' gave it off) the lines. Level 16: You're given the atomic number and symbol. Level 17: A test of general knowledge; read out the title aloud. Level 18: A test of general knowledge; find out which country has that flag. Level 19: What the next line is is a description of the previous.

item.title: Zahada
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_

Level 19: What the next line is is a description of the previous.
